title: RoutingSignal
description: Normalized routing decision signal for stepwise flow execution. Encapsulates the judgment about where to go next in the flow.

decision.description: The routing decision made: advance to next step, loop back, terminate flow, or branch.

next_step_id.description: The ID of the next step to execute (for advance/branch decisions).

reason.description: Human-readable explanation for the routing decision.

confidence.description: Confidence score for this decision (0.0 to 1.0).

needs_human.description: Whether human intervention is required before proceeding.
